name: Frog Quest (Zirk, Chloe, nephetheus, colorfulkitten, zanejgr, Lever, zino, Prismriver Orchestra)
name_original: Frog Quest (Zirk, Chloe, nephetheus, colorfulkitten, zanejgr, Lever, zino, Prismriver Orchestra)
description:
Suwako Moriya has been missing from the Moriya Shrine for some time. Her descendant, Sanae Kochiya, sets out on a journey to search for her. But who is responsible for the frog loving goddess' disappearance? 

Play as Sanae and team up with Aya Shameimaru and Reimu Hakurei (and Cirno because she begged to tag along) to find out where Suwako has gone! Also, help this shrine maiden as she develops relationships with her newfound companions.

There are currently two different routes with unique endings to choose from! 

We are working on balancing the game! Enable "Easy Mode" if you are having trouble reaching the endings.
